title: STFT-AECNN: An Attention-Enhanced CNN for Efficient Φ-OTDR Event Recognition in IoT-Enabled Distributed Acoustic Sensing
summary: This paper proposes STFT-AECNN, an attention-enhanced CNN for efficient event recognition from Φ-OTDR data streams in IoT infrastructures. It addresses the challenge of accurately recognizing events from massive Φ-OTDR data while preserving their inherent spatiotemporal structure, enabling large-scale distributed acoustic sensing for various applications.
usefulness_reason: The paper focuses on "event recognition" from "Φ-OTDR data streams" and emphasizes preserving "inherent spatiotemporal structure". This directly relates to "Spatio Temporal" and "Point Process" (events). While not explicitly a "Spatio Temporal Point Process" model, the core problem involves spatio-temporal event detection.
